sentences.sContent: Finally, people like to stereotype. This is an inferential process based on limited data.
sentences.sContent_eng: Finally, people like to stereotype. This is an inferential process based on limited data.
sentences.sCn: 最后，人们喜欢刻板地给人“穿靴戴帽”，这是基于有限的资料所做的推理。

synos.tran: 推理的；推论的；根据推理的

remMethod.val: infer(推断) + enti + al → 可推断的

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or derived from inference
